name: Snakebit
description:
Controls:

  • Change Direction: WASD / Arrows
  • Use Item: E / Shift
  • P: Pause

Items:

  • Speed boost: temporarily increases speed on activation
  • Combo boost: increases the bonus value and combo timer on activation until the next fruit
  • Raining fruit: ten fruit spawn on activation
  • Instant egg: instantly lay an egg
  • Clear all eggs: remove all eggs from the board
  • Eggs to apples: turn all eggs on the board into apples
  • Midas touch: turn all apples on the board into golden apples
